arts.ttl: Oxford United vs Brighton – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Oxford United face Brighton & Hove Albion in the Second Round of the Carabao Cup on Wednesday night. The classic cup tie at the Kassam Stadium pits the Championship strugglers against their Premier League opponents. Oxford will be looking for a major upset to kick-start their season, while Brighton are desperate to secure their first […] The post Oxford United vs Brighton – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Brighton XI vs Oxford United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brighton travel to the Kassam Stadium on Wednesday night for their Carabao Cup second-round tie against Oxford United, desperate to secure their first victory of the new season. The match is a crucial opportunity for Fabian Hürzeler to rotate his squad, build confidence after a frustrating start in the Premier League, and give debuts to […] The post Brighton XI vs Oxford United – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
